isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - REMOVE - CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER

svcproc.title: CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER

svcsubproc.title: Remove Cab Door Opening Scuff Plate and Seat Belt Retractor Cover on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models

note.para: This procedure applies to all front door openings for all cabs and models and rear door openings for crew cab models.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 100 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove four torx head screws (Item 1) securing cab door opening scuff plate (Item 2) to cab floor, passenger side shown. Lay torx head screws out of the way and save for installation.

Remove push-in fastener (Item 3) securing seat belt retractor cover (Item 4) to seat belt retractor assembly (Item 5), passenger side shown. Lay push-in fastener and cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover out of the way and save for installation.
Repeat procedure to remove driver side cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover.

figure.caption: Figure 100. Cab Door Opening Scuff Plate and Seat Belt Retractor Cover
